featured.text: Since that rainy morning in Mill Valley, the World Café approach has been applied to multi-group discussions and cooperative actions by businesses, industries, and educational institutions around the world.
“The mountains and valleys are the arms and legs of their god and the glaciers are the head,” explained the head researcher.
Jack: Oh, in a lovely valley, about three miles north of the National Park.
With pink cherry blossoms blooming everywhere, the valley ______ like a young bride under the bright spring sunshine.

definition.zh_def: 山谷，通常是兩側有山或丘陵的低地。
definition.en_def: A low area of land between hills or mountains, typically with a river or stream running through it.
definition.example: The hikers enjoyed the beautiful view of the valley from the mountain top.
